text: Aur isi tarah bahut se mushreekon ke liye unke shareekon ne apni aulad ke qatal ko khushnuma bana diya hai taa-ke unko halakat mein mubtila karein aur unpar unke deen ko mushtaba(confusion) bana dein. Agar Allah chahta to yeh aisa na karte, lihaza inhein chodh do ke apni iftara pardaziyon mein lagey rahein
